languages.text: Воспеши гимны славные, отперли они гермозатворы и отворили врата обители, ибо великое тщание во славу Вольного Торговца ждало их. Надобно было вести Фолстоун к процветанию, а веру — к торжеству.

Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.
languages.original_text: Воспеши гимны славные, отперли они гермозатворы и отворили врата обители, ибо великое тщание во славу Вольного Торговца ждало их. Надобно было вести Фолстоун к процветанию, а веру — к торжеству.

Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.

languages.text: Cantando himnos gloriosos, abrieron las esclusas y las puertas de su morada, ya que una grandiosa empresa en nombre de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente esperaba. Rocainmunda se llenaría de prosperidad y de fe. Era un triunfo.
languages.original_text: Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.

traits.locale_text: Cantando himnos gloriosos, abrieron las esclusas y las puertas de su morada, ya que una grandiosa empresa en nombre de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente esperaba. Rocainmunda se llenaría de prosperidad y de fe. Era un triunfo.

languages.text: 他们唱着荣耀的圣歌，解开了气闸，打开了修道院的大门，一场以行商浪人光辉之名的伟大征途正在等待着他们。在行商浪人的领导下，荒寂岩地将会走向繁荣与信仰，走向胜利。
languages.original_text: Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.

traits.locale_text: 他们唱着荣耀的圣歌，解开了气闸，打开了修道院的大门，一场以行商浪人光辉之名的伟大征途正在等待着他们。在行商浪人的领导下，荒寂岩地将会走向繁荣与信仰，走向胜利。

languages.text: 栄光の賛歌を歌いながら、修道士達はエアロックを解除して建物の門を開いた。自由開拓者の栄誉ある名のもとでの道が彼らを待っている。ファウルストーンは、繁栄と信仰、そして勝利へと向かうのだ。
languages.original_text: Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.

traits.locale_text: 栄光の賛歌を歌いながら、修道士達はエアロックを解除して建物の門を開いた。自由開拓者の栄誉ある名のもとでの道が彼らを待っている。ファウルストーンは、繁栄と信仰、そして勝利へと向かうのだ。

languages.text: Ruhmeshymnen singend, öffneten sie die Luftschleusen und die Tore, denn sie erwartete ein großes Unterfangen im Namen {mf|des glorreichen Freihändlers|der glorreichen Freihändlerin}. Foulstone erwartete Wohlstand im Glauben, es sollte ein Triumph werden.
languages.original_text: Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.

traits.locale_text: Ruhmeshymnen singend, öffneten sie die Luftschleusen und die Tore, denn sie erwartete ein großes Unterfangen im Namen {mf|des glorreichen Freihändlers|der glorreichen Freihändlerin}. Foulstone erwartete Wohlstand im Glauben, es sollte ein Triumph werden.

languages.text: Au son d'un hymne glorieux, l'on ouvre les portes du domaine, car dans le sillage prestigieux {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, un formidable destin guette. Sous son égide, Rochepeste va connaître la foi, la prospérité, et le triomphe
languages.original_text: Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.

languages.text: Şanlı ilahiler eşliğinde hava kilitlerini faal hâle getirdiler, kapıları açtılar çünkü ulu Hür Tacir adına büyük bir icraatte bulunmuş olacaklardı. Menfurtaş bir inanç ve bereket diyarı, bir zafer diyarı oldu.
languages.original_text: Singing hymns of glory, they unsealed the airlocks and opened the abode's gates, for a great endeavour in the glorious name of the Rogue Trader awaited them. Foulstone was to be led to prosperity and faith, to triumph.
